channel.title: Oracle Unified Directory Services Manager on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Oracle Unified Directory Services Manager on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Review the latest changes and known issues for Oracle Unified Directory Services Manager on Kubernetes. Recent changes Date Version Change October 2021 21.4.1 A) References to supported Kubernetes, Helm and Docker versions removed and replaced with Support note reference. B) Namespace and domain names changed to be consistent with Enterprise Deployment Guide for Oracle Identity and Access Management in a Kubernetes Cluster. C) Upgrading a Kubernetes Cluster and Security Hardening removed as vendor specific.
